leftPoller - Variable in class soccerbot.Navigation
 
LightLocalizer - Class in soccerbot
LightLocalizer is in charge of using the color sensor to perform localization.
LightLocalizer(Odometer, Navigation, LSPoller) - Constructor for class soccerbot.LightLocalizer
This constructor requires the Odometer object to update its position, a Navigation object to control the motors during localization, and a LSPoller to detect grid lines during the localization process
loadMotor - Static variable in class soccerbot.Robonaldo
 
localize() - Method in class soccerbot.LightLocalizer
Performs the localization process.
localize() - Method in class soccerbot.USLocalizer
This method performs the rising edge localization.
lock - Variable in class soccerbot.Navigation
 
lock - Variable in class soccerbot.Odometer
 
lock - Static variable in class soccerbot.Robonaldo
 
lsPoller - Variable in class soccerbot.LightLocalizer
 
LSPoller - Class in soccerbot
LSPoller, similar to USPoller, polls the EV3 color sensor for data.
LSPoller(Port) - Constructor for class soccerbot.LSPoller
Constructor takes in a Port object representing the port which the EV3 color sensor to be polled is connected to.
